total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the unique color that forms a square in the input grid.
Q2: Determine the size and location of the square formed by the unique color.
Q3: Create a new grid of the same size as the square identified in Q2.
Q4: Fill the new grid with the unique color identified in Q1.
